MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD5 postcode area of Kelso. Our engineers are on site at Sourhope and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a broken piece of equipment on the overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.03pm on Tuesday 1st December 2020.
